name: Simoultaneous
description:
Created for GJ+
by Team : Nothing Could be Done
By squad consisting of : Blazej Kuchta
Leader : Blazej Kuchta
Theme : Try Together

Plan your actions with your friend and solve difficult riddles. Remember the same units move always togeather!

Instructions:
Select your unit by pressing LPM on a grid tile,
Choose order by pressing 1 or 2 (movement or attack)
Place order on grid node that is highlighted by green

Changed your mind? Use PPM to cancel any current order.

Repeat for all your alive units then press backspace to finish your turn!

Kill all enemies and dont let them reach your side of the grid! Keep your allies safe, and your units safer! (no you cannot lose or win, i have not scripted that one xD)
